title: Alternating Bits
problem_statement:
31. Alternating Bits

Coding UNSOLVED

Given a positive integer, your task here is to check whether it has alternating bits in its binary representation. Alternating bits are when two adjacent bits will always have different values.

Print "true" if the integer has alternating bits else print "false".

Input Format

  • Single line containing an integer N

Constraints

  • 1 ≤ N ≤ 50

Output Format

  • Print "true" if the integer has alternating bits else print "false"

Examples

Sample Input 1

10

Sample Output 1

true

Sample Input 2

15

Sample Output 2

false

Explanation

The binary representation of 10 is: 1010
The binary representation of 15 is: 1111

Execution time limit

4 seconds

title: Check Binary
problem_statement:
32. Check Binary

Coding UNSOLVED

Problem Statement

Write a program to check whether the given number is in binary format or not. Print "true" or "false".

For example, 1011 is binary but 1013 is not.

Input Format

  • A single line containing the string S.

Constraints

  • 1<S.length<1000

Output Format

  • A string containing "true" or "false" based on the problem statement.

Sample Test Cases

Sample Input 1

0000

Sample Output 1

true

Sample Input 2

11112

Sample Output 2

false

Execution Time Limit

4 seconds
